selected_skills.name: compare_chart_values
selected_skills.purpose: To compare the average weekly work hours of each country against the 35-hour threshold.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine if the average weekly work hours for each country exceed 35 hours at any point on the chart.

selected_skills.name: count_objects_in_region
selected_skills.purpose: To count the number of countries that exceed the 35-hour threshold.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the number of countries identified by the compare_chart_values skill that exceed the threshold.
